As a **customer**
I want **to be able** to search for and purchase various spicy food on the jkpices website,
so that **I can easily find and buy the spicy meal that soothes my taste**.

###Acceptance Criteria
- Search Functionality
- Product Page
- Add to Cart
- Checkout Process
- Responsive Design
